definition: to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
to prepare to meet the enemy head-on

sentences.english: France are playing against Wales on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 星期六法國隊迎戰威爾士隊。

sentences.english: As he approached Goliath , what did he say?
sentences.chinese: 當他上前迎戰的時候，他對歌利亞說的什麼呢？

sentences.english: The King of Lu led the army by himself.
sentences.chinese: 魯國由魯王親自帶兵迎戰。

sentences.english: End of Nanjing has a team vs. Chongchao popular Chengdu Sheffield United.
sentences.chinese: 下場南京有有隊將主場迎戰衝超熱門的成都謝菲聯隊。

sentences.english: Next up for the Reds is the visit of Huddersfield Town to Carrington at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 曼聯的下一場比賽是本週末主場迎戰哈斯菲爾德。

sentences.english: Love is the willingness to be someone's haven against wind and rain in his or her struggle with life.
sentences.chinese: 愛是願意成爲對方迎戰人生，遮風避雨的安全港。

sentences.english: On Monday week we visit Norwich at the same stage.
sentences.chinese: 週一我們將在同一輪次迎戰諾維奇隊。

sentences.english: Business lobbyists were girding for battle even before the budget's unveiling.
sentences.chinese: 商業遊說組織則早在預算案公佈之前就已準備迎戰。

sentences.english: Alston will serve his suspension Friday when the Magic host the Celtics.
sentences.chinese: 週五魔術將主場迎戰凱爾特人，阿爾斯通將缺席。

sentences.english: Like to be challenged with a responsible job .
sentences.chinese: 喜歡迎戰責任重大的工作。

sentences.english: Apple's products are shrink-wrapped and ready to go.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司的產品已整裝待發，準備迎戰。

sentences.english: Roadwork is a novel of societal conflict, man vs. progress.
sentences.chinese: 道路工程，是社會衝突的小說，人主場迎戰進展。

sentences.english: The latter, as if he had seen his intention, turned towards Durward with mace uplifted;
sentences.chinese: 那“野豬”似乎看清了他的意圖，便舉起鐵杖迎戰。

sentences.english: Benitez admitted he is expecting a tough encounter against Newcastle.
sentences.chinese: 貝尼特斯認爲迎戰紐卡將會在一場艱苦的比賽。

sentences.english: Against Liverpool in the Premier League at home Bolton have won two, drawn two and lost four.
sentences.chinese: 迎戰利物浦之前，博爾頓的戰績是兩勝兩平四負。

sentences.english: Enke's death may bring about the cancellation of Saturday's friendly against Chile.
sentences.chinese: 由於恩克的死，德國週六迎戰智利的友誼賽可能取消。

definition: to defeat decisively/to win decisively/great victory/triumph
St Paul/São Paulo, city in Brazil
